# William Alexander Mackay
<img alt="William Alexander Mackay" class="profile-pic" src="data:image/jpg;base64,"/>
(24 February, 1900 - 24 September, 1982)

## Names

* William Alexander Mackay
* William Matheson Mackay (variation)
* Willie M Mackay (variation)

## Immediate Family

* Son: X
